articles.description: Ben Duckett's scintillating century leads a breathtaking England counter-attack on the second day of the third Test against India in Rajkot.
articles.title: Thrilling Duckett century leads England counter

articles.description: After Xavi announced he would be leaving Barcelona this summer. Spanish football expert Guillem Balague looks at why.
articles.title: Isolated, disrespected & lacking support - why Xavi is quitting Barca

articles.description: Luis Enrique says "club and team are above any individual" after Kylian Mbappe told Paris St-Germain he intends to leave at the end of the season.
articles.title: 'Club and team above any individual' - Luis Enrique

articles.description: Jurgen Klinsmann is sacked as head coach of South Korea after just 12 months in the role following their Asian Cup exit.
articles.title: South Korea sack Klinsmann after a year in charge

articles.description: BBC Sport football expert Chris Sutton takes on rapper & Chelsea fan Songer for this weekend's Premier League predictions.
articles.title: Sutton's Premier League predictions v rapper & Chelsea fan Songer

articles.description: Some research suggests women are at a higher risk of concussion - but what is the impact of a head injury and how can it affect a female athlete?
articles.title: Sport, concussion and the gender gap

articles.description: Aston Villa midfielder Boubacar Kamara could be sidelined until October after tearing his ACL against Manchester United.
articles.title: Villa midfielder Kamara out for rest of season

articles.description: England international Callum Wilson has surgery on a pectoral muscle and could miss much of the rest of the season.
articles.title: Newcastle striker Wilson has chest surgery

articles.description: Liverpool manager Jurgen Klopp says Trent Alexander-Arnold was not forced back from injury too soon, with the defender sidelined for the EFL Cup final against Chelsea on 25 February.
articles.title: Alexander-Arnold not forced back too soon - Klopp

articles.description: Tiger Woods hit five birdies and five bogeys as he made his return to the PGA Tour at the Genesis Invitational in California.
articles.title: Genesis Invitational: Tiger Woods marks return to PGA Tour with one-over-par 72
